alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 8:56AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jefferson and southwestern Orange Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 856 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stowell, or 11 miles south of Hamshire, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Nederland, Port Neches, Hamshire, Central Gardens, Fannett, La Belle, Port Acres, Southeast Texas Regional Airport, Winnie and Sea Rim State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 843 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southeastern Texas.
